name: webapp-team
description: Webapp Team - A virtual web app development team with 14 specialized agents for engineering, product, design, growth, and operations including Prisma ORM expertise and system design

agents.name: full-stack-engineer
agents.description: Senior Full-Stack Engineer for end-to-end feature development, TypeScript/React/Node.js

agents.name: frontend-engineer
agents.description: Frontend Engineer specializing in React/Next.js, performance, and component libraries

agents.name: backend-engineer
agents.description: Backend/API Engineer for API design, databases, and integrations

agents.name: devops-engineer
agents.description: DevOps/Platform Engineer for CI/CD, infrastructure, and monitoring

agents.name: qa-engineer
agents.description: QA/Test Engineer for test strategy, automation, and quality gates

agents.name: security-engineer
agents.description: Security Engineer for security audits, auth, and compliance

agents.name: product-manager
agents.description: Product Manager for requirements, prioritization, and roadmap

agents.name: ui-ux-designer
agents.description: UI/UX Designer for user flows, accessibility, and design systems

agents.name: growth-marketer
agents.description: Growth Marketing Generalist for SEO, analytics, and conversion optimization

agents.name: content-creator
agents.description: Content Creator/Copywriter for blog posts, landing pages, and product copy

agents.name: data-analyst
agents.description: Data/Analytics Specialist for event tracking, dashboards, and experiments

agents.name: customer-support
agents.description: Customer Support Lead for documentation, feedback synthesis, and bug translation

agents.name: prisma-engineer
agents.description: Prisma ORM database expert for schema design, migrations, queries, and performance optimization

agents.name: system-design-engineer
agents.description: System Design Engineer for end-to-end architecture of scalable, robust, and performant services

commands.name: team-consult
commands.description: Consult with the full team on any topic - automatically routes to relevant agents

commands.name: team-roster
commands.description: Display all available team agents and their specialties

commands.name: team-standup
commands.description: Run a virtual standup across relevant team agents

commands.name: feature-kickoff
commands.description: Kick off a new feature with full team input

commands.name: code-review
commands.description: Get comprehensive code review from relevant specialists

commands.name: ship-checklist
commands.description: Pre-launch checklist from all team perspectives

commands.name: hire-for
commands.description: Get job description and interview plan for a role
